Text:
Lovely!!!

You dont happen to have Kurosawas  "stray dog" in criterion too???

Hi

you can download "stray dog" and other kurosawa criterion from asiandvdclub.org

Hi...yeah I know about asian dvd club...
unfortunately i live in astudent condough using the same connection as some others ...the ip is blocked somehow...

I'll upload stray dog at d.v.d.q.u.o.r.u.m.es but by pando, not bittorrent, as other kurosawa films. To download pando in that forum, you need a ratio 1 and at least 4 GB uploaded. You can registered if you want.
I own the original Criterion version of this amazing film, but I was wondering if this release was improved in any way over the original release?
Nevermind, I found my answer on dvdcompare.net that this is an improved version. Thanks, I'll be sure to do more than 1:1 !
Thank you for your many fine uploads!
I'll keep seeding this till the next century..
thank you once again susanalic for all the fine uploads here at tpb!
